import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get model visibility"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/{assetId}/{modelId}/visibility"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Checks whether a specific model is visible or eligible for the given asset context. Use this when validating model selection during swaps, replacements, or category restrictions.

**Prerequisites**
1. **assetId** - Obtain from [POST /api/v1.0/assets/search](/docs/api/assets/keyword-search-assets) or [GET /api/v1.0/assets/\{assetId\}](/docs/api/assets/get-asset-by-id).
2. **modelId** - Obtain from the asset record or by querying models via [POST /api/v1.0/models](/docs/api/model-issues/get-issues-for-models).

**Workflow Example**
1. Load the asset to confirm its current model/category.
2. Choose the candidate model and capture its `ModelId`.
3. [GET /api/v1.0/assets/\{assetId\}/\{modelId\}/visibility](/docs/api/assets/get-model-visibility) to confirm eligibility.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `assetId`, `modelId` (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"assetId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the asset","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},{"name":"modelId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the model","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Visibility status returned","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Visibility status returned","properties":{"Item":{"type":"boolean"},"StatusCode":{"type":"integer"}},"title":"AssetModelVisibilityResponse"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
